entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.MailAddress.TryCreate parses input with spaces into a valid email address #82689
  • JIT: Incorrectly eliminated zero-extending mov after `cdqe` #82685
    8.0.0
  • X509Certificate2 constructor throws exception only on macOS when a byte blob with multiple certificates is decoded #82682
  • BitConverter.HalfToInt16Bits(Half) result comparison issue #82680

Closed

  • [Question] Working around Thread Non-PreEmptive Check #82684
  • Convert Georgian Year to solar year does not work on linux #82681
  • hostfxr_initialize_for_runtime_config fails with error code 0x80008093 #82670
  • FileSystemWatcher Changed event fires only after right click on file. #81717
  • SystemTextJson UnmappedJsonProperty error message not correct #82668
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/generics/WaitCallback/thread24/thread24.sh #82414
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Permit trailing data when parsing an X.509 certificate by DER content #82688
    area-System.Security
  • Handle the remainder in MemoryExtensions.Count vectorized #82687
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Reduce SequenceReader size 96 bytes -> 68 bytes #82686
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Fix links in Portable PDB spec #82683
    community-contribution

Merged

  • [wasm] CI: trigger wasm jobs on internal linker changes #82655
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Remove unused AOTMode msbuild property. #82675
  • Add stub for mini_is_gsharedvt_inst #82678
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fixing a FATAL_GC_ERROR in loh_allocate_in_condemned when in extremely low memory #82418
  • move fence to the right place #82661
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [jiterp] cmpxchg opcodes are supported #82674
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix asset counting after download retry #82617
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][aot] Emit llvm intrinsic declarations lazily. #82519
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute #82662
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Typo in DeniedValuesAttribute #82665
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable JitDasmWithAlignmentBoundaries and JitDasmWithAddress in Release #82666
  • [wasm] Add a GC lock API and deprecate it #82646
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Store Parallel.ForEachAsync exceptions from cancellation callbacks #82434
  • Replace IlcHostArch with SDK-computed value #82645
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #81082
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow wildcards when looking for nodes #82386
    community-contribution
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
